profile.title: HONOR DECLARATION FORM
profile.subtitle: What is this form for?
profile.paragraphOne: This form allows us to determine whether you are the beneficiary of one or more life insurance policies taken out by the deceased with an insurer other than
profile.paragraphTwo: This clarification will enable us to define the tax exemption you may qualify for, the applicable tax regulations based on your situation, and to fulfill obligations with the Tax Administration.

popup.title: Your Personal Data
popup.content: The information collected through this document is required by the insurer to process the death benefit you are entitled to and to fulfill its legal obligations. You have various rights regarding your personal data (right of access, rectification, opposition, etc.). For more information, you can visit the following address:

form.notice: All fields are mandatory except those marked as optional.
form.remark: Please note that the deceased may have multiple client numbers. That's why the number displayed here may be different from the one on the form received by mail.
